content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position(-5.0, 2.5)
- Steam engine at position(0.5, 6.5)
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler and steam to engine
- Small electric poles at positions(0.5, 4.5), (4.5, 4.5), (8.5, 4.5), (12.5, 4.5), (16.5, 4.5), (-3.5, 0.5), (0.5, 8.5)
- Inserter at position(-3.5, 2.5) to feed coal into boiler
- Wooden chest at position(-2.5, 2.5) for coal storage

### Coal Mining System at Position(18.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position(18.5, 2.5)
- Inserter at position(18.5, 4.5)
- Wooden chest at position(18.5, 5.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting System at Position(17.5, 72.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position(17.5, 72.5) for iron ore
- Electric mining drill at position(20.5, 72.5) for iron ore
- Transport belt at position(17.5, 74.5) for iron drill 1 output
- Transport belt at position(20.5, 74.5) for iron drill 2 output
- Electric furnace at position(17.5, 77.5)
- Electric furnace at position(20.5, 77.5)
- Small electric poles at positions(16.5, 70.5), (17.5, 75.5), (20.5, 75.5), (19.5, 79.5), (18.5, 79.5)
- Inserter at position(16.5, 74.5) to move ore from belt to furnace 1
- Inserter at position(21.5, 74.5) to move ore from belt to furnace 2
- Inserter at position(17.5, 79.5) for iron furnace 1 output
- Inserter at position(20.5, 79.5) for iron furnace 2 output
- Wooden chest at position(17.5, 80.5) for iron furnace 1 output storage
- Wooden chest at position(20.5, 80.5) for iron furnace 2 output storage
- Inserter at position(17.5, 82.5) to feed iron plates to steel furnace

### Steel Production System at Position(17.5, 85.5)
Consists of:
- Electric furnace at position(17.5, 85.5) for steel production
- Inserter at position(17.5, 87.5) to move steel plates to storage
- Wooden chest at position(17.5, 88.5) for steel plate storage
- Small electric poles at positions(20.5, 85.5), (19.5, 87.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting System at Position(-54.5, 87.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position(-54.5, 87.5) for copper ore
- Electric mining drill at position(-51.5, 87.5) for copper ore
- Transport belt at position(-54.5, 89.5) for copper drill 1 output
- Transport belt at position(-51.5, 89.5) for copper drill 2 output
- Transport belts connecting to furnaces at positions(-54.5, 90.5), (-54.5, 91.5), (-51.5, 90.5), (-51.5, 91.5)
- Electric furnace at position(-54.5, 93.5)
- Electric furnace at position(-51.5, 93.5)
- Small electric poles at positions(-52.5, 85.5), (-52.5, 95.5), (-53.5,
